desc: A quarter-credit course devoted to a broad study of the field of biomolecular science through the reading and discussion of primary and secondary literature across the field. Through exploration of the breadth of the field, biomolecular science concentrators plan their own level III course structure. While required of all biomolecular science concentrators, this course is open to all interested students. Offered annually in the spring semester. P/N only. Prerequisite: BIO 125, CHEM 125, or CH/BI 125, or the equivalent.
name: Expl Biomolecular Sci
prerequisites: Prerequisite: BIO 125, CHEM 125, or CH/BI 125, or the equivalent.
